title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
description: Three convicts run from the law across rural Mississippi in search of one of the men's supposed treasure.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts leave Earth to find a new home for humanity.

title: True Grit (2010)
description: A teenage girl hires a grizzled lawman to hunt down the outlaw who killed her father.

title: Alien
description: The crew of a commercial space tug accidentally stumble across a dangerous alien species.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: A young man comes across a droid containing an important message and leaves his farm to fight a galaxy-spanning empire.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: A lazy, middle-aged bowler gets wrapped up in events far beyond his control.
